title: This extensive list of pangrams (e.g. “the quick brown fox…”) also contains...
content:
This extensive list of pangrams (e.g. ‚Äúthe quick brown fox‚Ä¶‚Äù) also contains a list of phonetic pangrams, which use all the phonemes of English, like: ‚ÄúAre those shy Eurasian footwear, cowboy chaps, or jolly earthmoving headgear?‚Äù
